lessons.japanese: ボーナス全部を買い物と旅行に使ってしまった。
lessons.indonesian: I blew my whole bonus on shopping and travel.

lessons.japanese: ボーナスがいつもより少なかったのでがっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I was disappointed to see that my bonus was a bit less than I was expecting.

lessons.japanese: 生産力が落ちた。従って労働者のボーナスも少なくなるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Productivity has fallen. Accordingly, workers' bonuses will be reduced.

lessons.japanese: ボーナス全部を買い物と旅行に使ってしまった。
lessons.indonesian: I blew my whole bonus on shopping and travel.

lessons.japanese: ボーナスがいつもより少なかったのでがっかりした。
lessons.indonesian: I was disappointed to see that my bonus was a bit less than I was expecting.
